name: [FNN-2373] Professional receives Welcome letter
fullName: Subscribe: Subscribe Positive.[FNN-2373] Professional receives Welcome letter
statusMessage:
expect(received).toEqual(expected) // deep equality
                
                - Expected  - 4
                + Received  + 4
                
                  Dear AQA-CI-zEuRb-578-U-EblVk,
                  Congratulations with your account on Staging.prolinker.com!
                  Get the most out of Staging.prolinker.com by completing these four steps in just 10 minutes!
                - 1. Confirm your e-mail address. You will receive a separate e-mail with instructions. If you can't find this e-mail then go to account settings.
                + 1. Confirm your e-mail address. You will receive a separate e-mail with instructions. If you can't find this e-mail then go to account settings.
                
                - 2. Complete your profile as much as possible and request one or more work references to increase your visibility and chances with employers on our platform.
                + 2. Complete your profile as much as possible and request one or more work references to increase your visibility and chances with employers on our platform.
                  (The more complete your profile the higher you will end up in our search results; and thus the more requests you will receive).
                
                - 3. Select the appropriate categories under "Settings" > "Emails" to ensure you only receive notifications regarding relevant projects.
                + 3. Select the appropriate categories under "Settings" > "Emails" to ensure you only receive notifications regarding relevant projects.
                
                - 4. Upgrade your account to Standard or Premium and reply to some interesting projects.
                + 4. Upgrade your account to Standard or Premium and reply to some interesting projects.
                  You will now also receive a free chapter of our e-book every week. The e-book discusses topics for freelance professionals. Curious about the first chapter? Click here to get to know more about the different types of freelancer and the most common legal forms.
                  Team Staging.prolinker.com
                
                  ↵

expect(received).toContain(expected) // indexOf
                
                Expected substring: "Dear AQA-CI-MNIJm-578-U-herZd,
                Congratulations with your account on Staging.prolinker.com!
                Get the most out of Staging.prolinker.com by completing these four steps in just 10 minutes!
                1. Confirm your e-mail address. You will receive a separate e-mail with instructions. If you can't find this e-mail then go to account settings.·
                2. Complete your profile as much as possible and request one or more work references to increase your visibility and chances with employers on our platform.
                (The more complete your profile the higher you will end up in our search results; and thus the more requests you will receive).·
                3. Select the appropriate categories under \"Settings\" > \"Emails\" to ensure you only receive notifications regarding relevant projects.·
                4. Upgrade your account to Standard or Premium and reply to some interesting projects.
                You will now also receive a free chapter of our e-book every week. The e-book discusses topics for freelance professionals. Curious about the first chapter? Click here to get to know more about the different types of freelancer and the most common legal forms.
                Team Staging.prolinker.com·
                "
                Received string:    "Dear Employer,···
                Your account on ProLinker.com has been created.·
                The following steps will help you get the most out of your account:·
                1. Complete your profile
                2. Upgrade to a Recruiter account
                3. Post assignments and search for professionals using our advanced search filter
                4. Hire professionals
                5. Give the professional a reference
                6. Add professionals to your exclusive network and get access to the best professionals.··
                Good luck in hiring professionals for your projects!··
                The team at Staging.prolinker.com·
                "
